revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aerohive |model=HiveAP 20 |revision=ag |fcc_date=04/13/2007 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |type=access point |fcc_id=HEDAP20AG,QXO-RBT4102 |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.38 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale Semiconductor |cpu1_model=MPC8248 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F128J3D75 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620ETP-H |ram1_num=4 |jtag=yes,, 16-pin header |serial=yes,, DE-9,, (9600,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5213A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5112A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR5213A |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR5112A |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=3V RS232 Transceiver;Zywyn;ZT3243F;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-OR Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC32A;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-And Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC08A;;1;,,, Octal Buffer and Line Driver;NXP;74LVC244A;;1;,,, 3.3V Zero Delay Buffer;PulseCore Semiconductor;5P2305AF-1H;;2;,,, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4; |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ip=192.168.2.10 |default_user=root |default_pass=aerohive |oui=00:19:77 |oui_eth=00:19:77 }}
"P/N: 141662820001E REV:02" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" appears :to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device is assumed to use AR5213A for both radios.
The ''[[Freescale]] Semiconductor'' CPU used in this device is marked with... *MPC8248VRT1CA *400/200/100 MHZ *00000515 *MALAYSIA *1K50M GLCB0L
Sickers on the FCC EUT show a 00:12:CF OUI (''Accton'')
The serial (9600-8N1) credentials appear to also be ''root'' and ''aerohive''.
{{WiFiCert|WFA5552|11/19/2007}}
